Posts.Content: I am very interested in alternative methods -- have 2 clinics in Mexico I am trying to decide between.  For those of you who have experienced good results from alternative could you please be more specific about what you used.  It would really help me because as you know there are TONS of alternative out there!!  Also has anyone had any success with Protocel?
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body
